analysis.description:
KuaiMintableToken.judgeIsReachDailyLimit (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol#692-724) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (timestamp.parseTimestamp().year == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().year) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().month == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().month) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().day == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().day)
	- (timestamp.parseTimestamp().year == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().year) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().month == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().month) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().day == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().day)
	- (timestamp.parseTimestamp().year == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().year) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().month == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().month) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().day == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().day)

KuaiMintableToken.mint (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol#682-692) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(! judgeIsReachDailyLimit(mintAmount,timestamp)) (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol#684-685)

KuaiMintableToken.judgeIsReachDailyLimit (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol#692-724) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (timestamp.parseTimestamp().year == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().year) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().month == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().month) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().day == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().day) (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol#697-724)

BonusToken.standardDecimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol#654)
KuaiToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol)
KuaiToken.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol)
KuaiToken.standard should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol)
KuaiToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x26ddf6cabadcbf4f013841bd8d914830beb0d984.sol:
